name: 3brtr3g
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0

stmt.origin: sylib(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c4))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c1, c4))
-| wb(wbr(c3, c1, c4), wbr(c0, c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c1, c4))
-| wb(wbr(c3, c1, c4), wbr(c0, c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c3, c1, c4), wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wceq(c3, c0)
-| wceq(c4, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c1, c4))
-| wceq(c3, c0)
-| wceq(c4, c2)

comment: Substitution of equality into both sides of a binary relation. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-1997.)
